sentences.sContent: Laura is very mature for her age .
sentences.sCn: 相对她的年龄来说劳拉是很成熟的。

sentences.sContent: We’re mature enough to disagree on this issue but still respect each other.
sentences.sCn: 我们都很成熟，尽管我们对此事意见不同，但还是彼此尊重。

synos.tran: [农学][地质]成熟的；充分考虑的；到期的；成年人的

phrases.pCn: 成熟期；产品生命成熟期

words.tran: 成熟；化脓；生殖细胞之形成

remMethod.val: 自然(nature)中的n换成m就是成熟的(mature)

trans.tranOther: someone, especially a child or young person, who is mature behaves in a sensible and reasonable way, as you would expect an adult to behave
